TextBlock.Text: SOLANUM: It's you, friend. I feel like my mind is clear now, but I can't explain this, even for myself.
SOLANUM: I'm here, right? But how I am here? I thought about <color=lightblue>Timber Hearth</color> and now I am here.

SOLANUM: So, Nomai are dead? All of them? It's really sad to know, but how much time has passed? Last thing I remember is that Bells guided me on the <color=lightblue>Quantum Moon</color> pilgrimage like it was an hour ago. All these years I was trapped in quantum uncertainty.

SOLANUM: I've never met one of your kind before. It's an honor to speak with you! I particularly admire your four eyes. And I... I have to apologize on behalf of the clan. We tried to explode the <color=lightblue>sun</color> once and that would've turned your race to ashes. This is unacceptable ethically, but I'm happy we failed. It is impossible for me not to say this, when I observe this young, curious race growing up.

SOLANUM: I think it's time to find out what is happening here and why we are here. You saw that <color=orange>Orbital Probe Cannon</color>? Is it.. broken? I need to check its <color=orange>Probe Tracking Module</color> first.
